name: thrifty
description: Thrifty is a self-hosted personal finance web app for tracking spending, income, and budgets. It offers charts, categories, and insights via a clean, mobile-friendly interface for managing everyday expenses.
features: Expense tracking: Record daily expenses with categories, amounts, and notes for comprehensive spending oversight.
Income management: Track income sources and amounts to understand your complete financial picture.
Budget planning: Set monthly or category-based budgets and monitor spending against targets with visual indicators.
Charts and insights: Visualize spending patterns with charts showing trends, category breakdowns, and comparisons.
Category system: Organize transactions with customizable categories for detailed expense analysis.
Mobile-friendly: Manage finances on the go with a responsive interface optimized for mobile devices.
Transaction history: Browse complete transaction history with search and filtering capabilities.
Recurring expenses: Track recurring bills and subscriptions to understand fixed monthly costs.
Reports: Generate financial reports for specific periods to review spending habits and identify savings opportunities.
Privacy-focused: Keep all financial data on your own server with no third-party access or data sharing.
Quick entry: Add transactions rapidly with minimal required fields and smart defaults.
Balance tracking: Monitor account balances over time to understand cash flow and savings progress.
